author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Mix the batter together and leave to sit while you fry the sausages. Heat one tbsp oil in a medium ovenproof frying pan and gently brown the sausages for 2-3 minutes.  Add the remaining oil to the pan and heat.  Pour in the batter and cook in the oven for 15-20 minutes or until risen and golden.
ingredients: 1 free-range egg,  75g/2½oz plain flour,  ¼ pint milk,  4 sausages,  4 tbsp olive oil
